content:
/>
Introduction
This topic contains information on allowable items for reimbursement, including
payment of accrued as reimbursement
medicinal expenses as reimbursable expenses
nursing expenses as reimbursable expenses
transportation expenses as reimbursable expenses
miscellaneous items as reimbursable expenses
, and
burial payment made to accrued or substitute claimant
.
title: M21-1, Part XI, Subpart ii, Chapter 3, Section E  - Accrued Authorization and Notification
citation: Part XI, Subpart ii, Chapter 3, Section E
